Body:
test_case = ColumnChooserTestCase(data_inputs=np.array([[1, 1, 2, 3], [10, 
    11, 12, 13], [20, 21, 22, 23]]), expected_outputs=np.array([[0, 1, 2, 3
    ], [10, 11, 12, 13], [20, 21, 22, 23]]), expected_processed_outputs=np.
    array([[2, 2, 4], [20, 22, 24], [40, 42, 44]]),
    column_transformer_tuple_list=[(slice(0, 2), MultiplyBy2()), (2,
    MultiplyBy2())], n_dimension=3)
data_inputs = test_case.data_inputs
p = ColumnTransformer(test_case.column_transformer_tuple_list)
outputs = p.transform(data_inputs)
assert np.array_equal(test_case.expected_processed_outputs, outputs)
